    • isToAssignProfessor

      boolean isToAssignProfessor(Integer studentCount, Integer professorCount)
      contains the condition for assigning a professor this method will be overridden by characters effects
      Parameters:
      studentCount - number of students of a given colour contained in the player entrance
      professorCount - number of students associated to the professor of the given colour
